statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); git_status=""; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then git_dirty=$(cd "$current_dir" && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_dirty" ]; then git_status=" *"; fi; git_info=" on $git_branch$git_status"; fi; else git_info=""; fi; printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[32m%s\033[0m%s \033[90m[%s]\033[0m" "$(whoami)" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$git_info" "$model_name"
